A company is hiring for a management position and receives applications from two candidates, Alice and Bob. The company cannot determine the true qualifications of each candidate, but Alice knows that she is better qualified than Bob with probability 0.8, and Bob knows that he is better qualified than Alice with probability 0.7. 

Assuming that Alice and Bob are rational, what is the probability that Alice will signal her higher level of qualification to the company?
